thread.section_title: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI | www.risla.com | 3 of 10
thread.title: Lauryn
thread.title_full: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI reviewed by Lauryn

author: Lauryn
title: Lauryn
text: This is the second year I have utilized the College Planning Center services and the people there are very efficient and thorough in completing the FAFSA forms needed for college. Thank you for your help.
